00029     class View {

00032             public:
00034                 FunctionNotSupportedException(const std::string &what):
00035                     std::runtime_error(what) { }
00036         };

00039             View(): numFrames(1), numLoops(1) { }

00066                     void setParameter(const std::string &parmName, const T &value) {
00067                 ApplyChanges(ParameterMap(parmName, value));

00121 
00123             virtual unsigned getNumFrames() { return numFrames; }
00125             virtual unsigned getNumLoops() { return numLoops; }
00127             virtual void setDefaultBackground() {
00128                 static Color defaultBackground(0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 1.0);
00129                 setBackground(defaultBackground);
